Webinar: Our Refuge and Strength: Transforming Attachment to the Living God

This webinar addresses a vital question for #spiritually integrated
#clinicians: how do therapists navigate conversations about a client’s
attachment to #God as either a displacement or defense against early
attachment wounds?

Join Geoff Goodman on July 8, 2025, from 3–4:30 PM EDT for “Our Refuge
and Strength: Transforming Attachment to the Living God.” Learn how to
bring clarity, compassion, and #clinical skill to these complex dynamics.

Earn 1.5 CE hours. Free for #ACPE members, $35 for non-members.

More at
https://acpe.edu/education/events-professional-development/events-calendar/2025/07/08/default-calendar/july-8th-2025-webinar---global-forgiveness-with-david-thornton

#psychology #mentalhealth #socialwork #psychiatry #faith #healthcare
#SIP #pastoral #counseling #religion #spotlight
@psychotherapist @psychotherapists
@psychology @socialpsych @socialwork
@psychiatry @spirituality @religion

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The #ACPE #Psychotherapy Commission is a community invested in the practice of integrating #spirituality into our work. This work may be done by a volunteer helper, a #spiritual #healer, or a licensed mental health practitioner. We offer training.

Learn more at https://sip-com.wildapricot.org . Blog at https://sip-com.wildapricot.org/news .

Imagine you pawn a gold bar, but it's invisible, weighs nothing, it's nowhere and everywhere, yet you expect the money.

Now imagine your faith in God.
